meta.description: Optimize the quantity of banana-haters and combo packages to maximize net profit given stock constraints.

sets.name: PACKAGES
sets.description: Types of packages available for sale.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit from selling each type of package.

params.name: package_contents
params.description: Number of each item in each type of package.

vars.name: quantity
vars.description: Quantity of each package to prepare.

objective.name: max_net_profit
objective.description: Maximize the net profit from selling packages.

constraints.name: stock_apples
constraints.description: Do not exceed the stock of apples.

constraints.name: stock_bananas
constraints.description: Do not exceed the stock of bananas.

constraints.name: stock_grapes
constraints.description: Do not exceed the stock of grapes.
